requestParams.name: begin_time
requestParams.desc: 调账时间范围 ，查询beginTime之后发生的记录，格式yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss

requestParams.name: end_time
requestParams.desc: 调账时间范围 ，查询endTime之前发生的记录，格式yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss

requestParams.name: page_size
requestParams.desc: 分页大小 ，目前最大支持50

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['page_size']=2
params['page']=2
params['operator_name']="1"
params['mobile']="18616268687"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.cardvoucher.valuecard.adj.rcd.byacp.search', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'2', 'page' => '2', 'operator_name' => '1', 'mobile' => '18616268687', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(

name: search
